english.segment1: I know as I envision. Your never ending power. Your splendor is more. Than I can imagine
english.segment2: Ive heard of Your perfections. But Ive been blind to You. Open my eyes. Open my ears. Open my heart
english.segment3: CHORUS. Unveil my eyes. So I can see Your glory. Unveil my eyes. So I can know Youre here. Youre here
english.segment4: Your love, it overtakes me. And makes me who I am. As I am undone. In light of Your glory
english.segment5: Bridge. Take apart this world. That I have made. Make this heart aware. Of more than me. Reveal to me the depths. Of who You are. And come and teach me like a child. To trust Your heart.
